welcomeDesc: I am your intelligent assistant. I know everything about your vacancies, candidates, and company culture.
disclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Check important info.
tokenWarning: Using the assistant consumes organization tokens

capabilities.title: My Capabilities
capabilities.vacanciesDesc: I see all requirements and details of your open positions
capabilities.candidatesDesc: Access to profiles, skills, and all test results
capabilities.interviewsDesc: I study your notes and protocols of conducted meetings
capabilities.multimodalDesc: I support document, PDF, and image uploads
capabilities.cultureDesc: I know your company's DNA and select people who fit your values

global.q1: How many active vacancies do we have now?
global.q2: Which of the recent candidates is most promising?
global.q4: Give advice on improving the HR brand

vacancy.q1: Analyze the requirements of this vacancy
vacancy.q2: Which of the current candidates fits best?
vacancy.q3: Suggest questions for a technical interview
vacancy.q4: How to speed up hiring for this position?

candidate.q1: Analyze the test results of this candidate
candidate.q2: What risks do you see in this candidate?
candidate.q3: Write interview questions based on their psychometrics
candidate.q4: Compare them with the vacancy requirements

deleteConfirm.title: Delete chat?
deleteConfirm.description: This action cannot be undone. All messages in this chat will be permanently deleted.
